thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com
thread.title: Paul Jeannel

author: Paul Jeannel
title: Paul Jeannel
text:
Thank you for selling your products in the USA. As I am sure you are aware, in my state (Idaho) it is illegal to utilize any cannabis related medicine that has too much THC (more than .09% THC is illegal here, I believe).
My daughter, Hannah, has a form of epilepsy that does not always respond well to pharmaceutical medications (especially emergency rescue medicines used during a grand mal seizure). I ordered some CBD crystals from your San Diego office and I spoke with an extremely professional and compassionate person (I forgot her name). The CBD crystals arrived quickly, securely and packaged exactly as you described.
To make her emergency seizure rescue medicine, I mix the CBD crystals in a and put that solution into a . Two days ago my daughter had a grand mal seizure. The CBD solution that I created, with your crystals, was able to completely stop her seizure in 3 minutes and 21 seconds!! Trust me, for Hannah, that was miraculous.
AND her post-seizure period (postictal state) which can be anywhere from 60 minutes to several hours was less than 15 minutes
As a father, I am so grateful for what your company is doing. As a citizen of humanity, I am so angry at my government for stating that this plant has NO medicinal value. I am a Christian, a husband, the father of four, and a US air force retiree. It is for these reasons I write this review. I am a normal, completely sober parent who is 'shouting', "this has worked for Hannah's epilepsy and maybe it could help your child too"--I do NOT know, I am NOT a physician, I am just a parent sharing our fantastic news.
I have a deep gratitude for you all. I am forever grateful. And have already placed my next order!
